| description    = The signature beverage of the Kraken's Eye in Port Maje. This foamy drink is black as pitch and tastes faintly of the sea air and salt water. The inn's proprietor has long claimed this mead contains kraken ink, a trophy of a long-ago sea hunt, generously shared with all paying patrons.
